trans-unit.source: Represents a method that will handle the routed events that enables a drag-and-drop operation to be canceled by the drag source, for example <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.QueryContinueDrag"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en metode som håndterer rutet hendelsene som aktiverer dra og slipp annullere av drakilden, for eksempel <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.QueryContinueDrag"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used with the following attached events: - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements.
trans-unit.target: Denne representanten brukes med følgende vedlagte hendelser:- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>Denne representanten brukes også med følgende rutet hendelser for base elementer.</xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.PreviewQueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Disse rutet hendelsene videresende er oppført ovenfor vedlagte hendelsene for å gjøre dem mer tilgjengelig for generell elementet modellen i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewQueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewQueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewQueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewQueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>Vedlagte hendelser og base elementet rutet-hendelser dele hendelsesdataene sine, og den Bobling og tunnelering versjoner av distribuert hendelsene også dele Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.PreviewQueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewQueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan påvirke håndtert egenskaper for hendelsen underveis hendelsen-ruten.
Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [inndataene oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName> attached event occurs during a drag-and-drop operation and allows the drag source to determine whether the drag-and-drop operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>vedlagte hendelsen oppstår under dra og slipp og gjør drakilden å finne ut om dra og slipp bør avbrytes.</xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.QueryContinueDrag?displayProperty=fullName>
